item.title: [SCAR] Notepad Drawer
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

[quote=“KyleGut3, post:2, topic:65577”]So it draws in HELLO WORLD, and then mona lisa? :P.

Interesting, but its not TOO useful, if you know what I mean. The ASCII picture of the mona lisa could be better distributed over the text file itself.

As for it being your first script, you have damned good formatting for a beginner. I would suggest trying to make something more complicated, and remember that SCAR is NOT just for runescape. It works for a horde of different games, programs, etc. It is an amazing program that can do almost ANYTHING a human can do, so long as you program it properly.

So keep a scriptin, and take a look at the Scar Tutorial.exe for some tips on the more advanced procedures [and then maybe even work with some SRL, or other includes].[/quote]
Thanks. Well i needed a easy idea and a random one for my first script :P.

Im working on a leetness generator for my second script. should be done soon

Read full topic

item.title: [SCAR] Notepad Drawer
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

So it draws in HELLO WORLD, and then mona lisa? :P.

Interesting, but its not TOO useful, if you know what I mean. The ASCII picture of the mona lisa could be better distributed over the text file itself.

As for it being your first script, you have damned good formatting for a beginner. I would suggest trying to make something more complicated, and remember that SCAR is NOT just for runescape. It works for a horde of different games, programs, etc. It is an amazing program that can do almost ANYTHING a human can do, so long as you program it properly.

So keep a scriptin, and take a look at the Scar Tutorial.exe for some tips on the more advanced procedures [and then maybe even work with some SRL, or other includes].

Read full topic

item.title: [SCAR] Notepad Drawer
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

My First Ever Script. Follow instructions and enjoy.

[code]{.Script Info:

ScriptName = Notepad Drawer

Author = Wonderguy6

Description = It Draws the Mona Lisa and Dose Hello World in ASCII

Version = 1

Date = 8/4/07

Comments =

|====================================================+
| INSTRUCTIONS: |
| 1.Open up Notepad. |
| 2.Set the Font to: Courier |
| The Font Style to: Normal |
| And the Size to: 10 |
| 3. Make sure Word Wrap is Ticked and Notepad is F|ullscreen
| 4. Move the crosshair specifiyer onto Notepad |
| 5. Watch it Draw Hello World and the Mona Lisa. |
|====================================================+

/Script Info}

program Notepad_HelloWorld;

procedure Notepad;
begin
  SendKeysSilent('  ___ ______________.____    .____    ________ ._.' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent(' /   |   \_   _____/|    |   |    |   \_____  \| |' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('/    ~    \    __)_ |    |   |    |    /   |   \ |' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('\    Y    /        \|    |___|    |___/    |    \|' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent(' \___|_  /_______  /|_______ \_______ \_______  /_' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('==================================================' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent(' __      __________ __________.____     ________ ._.' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('/  \    /  \_____  \\______   \    |    \______ \| |' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('\   \/\/   //   |   \|       _/    |     |    |  \ |' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent(' \        //    |    \    |   \    |___  |    `   \|' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('  \__/\  / \_______  /____|_  /_______ \/_______  /_' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('       \/          \/       \/        \/        \/\/' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('This Script Was made by Wonderguy6. This is my First Script and i Really Hope you liked it. Now Have a look at the Mona Lisa ');
  SendKeysSilent(';)' + Chr(13));
     SendKeysSilent('-' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('-' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('-' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('-' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('-' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('ZZZZ$Z$$$ZZ$$$$$77$777777777777777777777I77II7I?III?IIII???????+++????????++++++=++++++++++++++++++=++======+======+++++' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('ZZZZZZZZ$$ZZ$77777777777III777777I7777IIIIIIIII??IIIIII???????++++???????++++++++++++?????++++++++++========+===~+=+++++' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('ZZZZZZ$$$$$$77777$$77I77777777III77IIIIII7IIIII????II????I7$ZZZ$$7I???????++?+++++++++++++++++++++++==+=============++++' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('$ZZ77$7$$$$$777777777777I7777IIII77I777III?III??????IDNNMNNNNNDDDNNNDDO7????+++++=++=++++++++=++++====+========~~===++++' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('ZZ$$$7777$$$$$777777777777IIIIIIII7IIIIIIIIII?I??+IZNND8NNNMMMMNNNDDDNND8?+??+?++++++++++++++==+=+===++=======~~~====+++' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('$$$$$$$$Z$$$$7777777777I7I?II??IIIIII?III???????$DMNN8O8NNNNNNNNMMMMND8DNMD$+++?++==++++++++=======~===========~~======+' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('$$$$Z$$$$$$$7777I777IIIIII?IIIIIIIII?????+????ZNND8DDZZDDDDDDDNNNNNNMMMMNNNNNZ?++=====+++++++=====~~==~===~==~=~=~======' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('$$$7$$$7$777III777IIIIIIIIIII??III??III???++?$MNNDDD8$O88DDDNMNNNNNNMMMMMMDNMMN7+=====+++++==========~~~~~~~~~~=~======+' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('77777777777777IIIII7IIIII????????II?????++++$DN8Z7?+++=++???I$ODNNNMMMMMNNNNNMMM+=+===~==========~==~~~~~~~~~~~~=~======' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('$$77777777777I77IIIIIIII????II?III?????++++I8N$I?+======++???I$O8DDNNNMMNNNMNMNMZ+=+==~===~~====~==~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~======' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('$$77777777III77IIIIIIII??????I?I????+++++?I8NOI?=~~~~~~~~~==+?I7$ZDNNNNMMMMNNNMNMO+===~~===~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~::~~=======' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('$$$$$$77II77IIIIIIIIIII?????????????+++++7NM87+=~:~~:~~~~~~==++I7$8DNNNMNMMMMMNMNMO=~=======~~~~~~~:~~~~~~:::::::~~=====' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('77777$$7IIII?II??II??????????++++??++===$NMNZI+=~~~~~~~~~~~==+?I7$OO8DNMNNNMNNMMNMM$==+++===~===~~~~~~~~:::::::::~~~====' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('7II?I7I77III???+????++???????++????+==~+$DMD$I+=======~=====+???I7$ZO8DDNNMMNNMMMMMD???+++++++==~=~~~~=~~~~~:::::~~~==+=' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('777I777$7II???????++++??????+++???++==+IONM8$I+============+++??II7$ZZODNNNMMMMMMMMM7?I??????+=====~~~~~~~~~~::::~~~===+' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('$7777$$ZZ7I7I??++?I?++?++???+++++++===7$DNNO7I++===~~=======++++++?I7$Z8NNNNNMNMNMMM8I7IIII7I+=====~+=~~::::~~~::~~~===+' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('ZZZOOZ8OO$7III?II77I?+++++++++=====+=?78DMMZI?=+===~=~=~==++=+++???II7Z8NMMMMMMMNMNMD7$$$I77I????+++?=~~~~~~~::::::~==++' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('O8888ZZZ88Z$$$$7777$7?I7?++=+=++====+7$8NMMOI?????+=+===?7$7IIIII77$ZZODNNMMMMMMNNMNN$OZ$7IIII?I??++?+?+=~~:~~:::::===++' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('O8DD8OOOOOOOZ$$$$$Z$$$Z$7I++++++====?$Z8MMM87?I77$I++++?$ZOZZZZOZ$OOOOO8NNMMMMMMNNNMMOZ$ZZ$$777I??+??+?+=~~:~~~::::~====' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('DDDD88OOOZZZZOOOZZOOOOZ$ZZ7+?+=++=++IOO8DNMDDDI777$ZI+?ZDDZ7$OOO8DMNO$ZODMMMNNNNMMMNMDOZZZZZ$III?I7$7I??=~~~~~~~:~==++++' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('888888888OOOO8OZO8OOOZO$7$Z+?+=+++??IZDNNMMOZDIZNDO7I=I8O$I?IOZZZZ???I7O8MMNNMMMMMMMMNOOZZZZZ7$$$77$77I++~:::::~:~====+?' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('DD8D8O8OOO888OOOZ8D8O88ZZ8+???IZO$???ONNMMMZIIII$Z7?+=7ZZ7??I77$7I++?I7ODMMMMMMMMNNNMMO8OOOZ$7$$$77$777I?=~~~~~~~===+++?' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('8D88OO88OOO8888OODD888OOO8OZ7$OO$8Z7ZO8NMMN7?+=====+?+I77I?=~~~~~=??I7Z8DMMMMNMMMMMNNMZZZZZ$$777$$$Z$$$7I+==~==~=====++?' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('8DDDO88888888DDD8DD88DD8O888OZOZ$DO$OO8NMMM$?+====++++?II?+==~~~==?I7$Z8NMMMMNMMMMNNNMZZZZZZ$$Z$$$$ZZZ$7I?==========++??' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('DD888D8OO8DDD8ODNDD88DDD8D8D8O8OODOO88DNNMM8I+=~==+++=?II?++====++I7$ZODNMMMNMMNMMNNNM77777I??I???????????++++++???????I' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('NMMNNNNNDDDND8D88DD8DDDDDD8DD8D8D8DNNNNNNMMD7+++==++++II7I?++==++?7$ZO8NNMMMNNNMMMMMNN88OOOOO$$$$$$$7I??I???++??III7$$7I' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('NMMNDDNNNDDDD88O88888D8DN8DDDDDDNNNMMNNNMMMMZ7++??I?=?777ZI++=+??I$ZOODNNMMMMMMMMMMMMNDD8O8OOOZZZZZZZ$ZZ$7I7777I7I7$$ZZZ' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('NNNNNDDNNDDDNDNDD888DD88DDDDDDDDDNNNNNMMMMMMD$II?++?$8NMND7++??II7ZO88DNMMMMMMMMMMMMMMNDDD888OOOOOO8OZ$Z$$$ZZZ$$$$$$$$ZZ' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('MMNMNDDNNNDDNDDDNDD8DD888D88DDDDNNNMNNNMMMMMNZ7II?==?NNN8ZI??III7$$ZO8DNMMMMMMMMMMMMMMN8OOOOOOOOZOOOZOZZZZOZZZZ$$$$$$ZZ$' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('NNNMMNNDDNDDNDDDNND8DDDDDD88DDDDDNDNMMMMNMMMMO7I77?++I7$$77Z7IIII7ZZO8DNNMMMMMMMMMMMMNND888ZOOOZZZOOOOZZZZ$$77777$$ZZOO8' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('MNNMNDDDNNNNNDDDDDD8DDNDDDDDDNNDNDDDNMMMNNMMMN7II7I?77$ZOOZ7I??II7ZO8DNNNMMMNNMMMMMMMNNN8OOZOZZZZZZZZZZZZ$$$$$$$$$$ZOOOO' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('NMMNDNNNNNDDDDDDDNNNNNMNDDDNDNNDD88DNNNNMMMMMMO7I?++IZZZZZ$77II7$$O8DDNNMMMMMMMMMMMMMNND8OOOOZZZOOZZZZZZZZZZZZZOOOZZZZZO' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('NMMNDNNNNNNDNDDDDNDNNNNNNNNDDDDDD88DNNMMMMMMMMNO$II??$$Z$77$777$ZZ8DDDNNMMMMMMMMMMMMMMDD8ZOO8OZZZ$ZZOOOOZZZZOOOOOOZOOZ$Z' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('NMMNNNNNNNNNNNNNDNNDDDDDD8D88D8D88O8NDDNMMMMMMMMNO7?+===?I777$ZO88DDDNMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMND8O$ZZZ$$$$$ZOZOOZZZ$$$Z$$ZZ$ZOZZ' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('MNNMNNMNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNDDD888888888O8NNNMNNNMMNMMMMNOI++?I77$O88DDDDNNMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMNNNDOZZZZ$$$$$$ZZZZOZ$$ZZOOO$$ZOZZO' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('NNMMMNMMMDDNNNNNNNNNDNNDDDDD88O8OOZ$8NNNMMMMMMMMMMMMNZZOO88DDDDDDNMMMNNNMMMNMMMMMMMMNMNNDZOZO8ZOOZZZOOZO8O8OOOOO8OZZZZ$$' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('MMMNNNMMNNNDNDNNNNNNNDNNDDDDDD88OZZ$OMNMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMNNNMMMMMNNNNNNNNNMMMMMMMMMMNNNND88O8OOOOOZOOOO8OZO888888OZZZO8' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('NMNNNMNMMMNDNNNNNNNND88DOO8OOZOOZZZ$ZDNMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMNNMMMMMMNNNNNNDNDDNNMMMNMMMMMMNMMND88OOZZZZZ$OOO88OO8888O8O888OOO' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('MMMMMMMNMNNNNDDDDDDD8888D8OZZZZZZOZZO8NMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMN$ZO88DNNNDDD88OOO8DNNMMNMMMMNNNNNN8O8O8OOOO8OOOO8OZZZO88OOZOZZZO8' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('MMMMMMMMMMNDNNNDD888OOO8OZ8OOOZOZZZZOOONMMNNMMMMMMMMMMMZI7$$OOO888OOZZZZZ8DNMNNNMMMMNNNMMDD8Z$77II7$77$$$$$$$77$7I??7$ZZ' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('NNMMMMMMMNDDND88D888O8OO8O88OOOOOOOO888NMMMNMMMMMMMMMMMD7II77$ZZZZZZ$$77$Z8NNDNMNNMNDNNMMMN8DD8O8O8OZZ7I77Z$77777$$ZOZ7$' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('NNNNNNNNNNNND88DNNDDNNNNNOOOOOOOZOZONDDMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMN8$7III777$$777I7I7$Z8NNNNNNNN88MMMMMNMND888DNZOO8DNZ77II777ZZ$7$O' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('NNNNNNDNDDD88888D8DNNNNNMDD8O8DD8DNDNNMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMDOZ$7II?I7777IIIII?7$$ODNDDDDDN88MNNMMNNND8OO8NODD8DN8O7II77$Z$$7$O' + Chr(13));
  SendKeysSilent('NNNNNNNNDDDDD888D8NDDDO8NMNMNNNMNNMMNNNMMMMMMMMMMMNDO7I?I????????I?++????I7Z8DDNN88N8DMNMNNMNDDNNNND88ZZOOZZ7II?IZ$ZZ7$$' + Chr(13));

  Writeln('Thanks for using my script');
  Writeln('Hope You Liked it.');
  Writeln('Please Give Me Feedback.');
  Writeln('Yes. I Did use a generator for the Mona lisa');
end;

begin
 Notepad;
end.[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2007, 08:24:53 PM[/size][hr]Im Planning on making a runescape script but i need help :p
